backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with storage mixins plus data types for users, tasks, audit logs, avatars, and comparison helpers for sorting tasks and history.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration function returning an empty state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and including a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Stores the rebuild timestamp and build version number.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling authentication flow, profile setup, and role‑based dashboard routing.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that captures rendering errors and shows a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager view showing a selected assistant’s overtime totals, history, CSV export, and task habit metrics.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Scrollable assistant list displaying avatars and overtime totals with selection support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, theme toggle, user avatar/profile controls, and logout handling using Internet Identity and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Manager dashboard rendering assistant overtime summaries and a team bar chart using fetched totals.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Displays cumulative overtime over time as a line or bar chart, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime entries with validation, submission handling, and toast feedback.
Paginated, searchable overtime history table with editing enabled only for the latest entry.
Card showing total overtime balance broken into days, hours, and minutes with loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Provides a modal for uploading a custom profile picture or selecting from preset avatars, handling validation and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar using a profile picture, preset asset, or fallback initials/icon, loading external blob URLs when needed.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Displays a dialog for viewing and editing a user's profile, including avatar, role, and initials with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Shows a searchable, filterable audit log of task actions with timestamps, task lookup, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Displays a dialog with a large preview of an evidence image for a task, with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task complete, allowing comment entry and optional photo upload before submitting.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Displays attribution for task completion, showing the completer's avatar and name or initials.
Component for selecting or capturing a task completion photo, handling validation, camera use, previews, and removal.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Dialog showing a task’s audit history with timestamps, actions, and optional evidence photo previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Interface for viewing and updating each assistant’s task preferences, with selectable assistants and preference editing.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main task management section that lists tasks, supports search, and handles creating, editing, deleting, and marking tasks done.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Table listing tasks with urgency indicators, actions, pinning, and evidence photo/history previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: React dialog component for creating, editing, validating, and deleting to‑do tasks with form state and frequency handling.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Exports a list of 24 dental‑themed preset avatar definitions and a helper to fetch one by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, avatars, tasks, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark/system theme selection, persistence, and system preference syncing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and extensive light/dark theme color variables for the app’s UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑dos and overtime, fetching user overtime data and handling overtime logging.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login UI with branding and a sign‑in button showing loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Displays manager dashboard with tabs for to‑dos, team management, analytics, and audit logs, supporting assistant selection and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Form for new users to set username, initials, and language, registering their profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Generates a usable URL for an ExternalBlob by preferring direct URLs or falling back to creating an object URL from bytes.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Utility functions for formatting overtime dates, getting today's local date, and checking if a date is in the future.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns a CSS class name for overtime cells based on whether time was added or used.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates uploaded images by checking MIME type and enforcing a 6MB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Provides deterministic accent color sets for avatar tiles based on a preset ID.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Utilities for computing on‑time task metrics, formatting completion history, and labeling or coloring task preferences.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides date utilities for task frequencies, computing next due dates, urgency scores, and formatting due messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters for routing and state retention.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for resetting user profiles and auto-assigning the first post-reset user as manager.
